title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 163.8 - Validity of record of deed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 163.8 - Validity of record of deed

State Regulations

When a deed is recorded notwithstanding an omission or
inaccuracy in the form prescribed by the commissioner or in any certification
by the transferor on such form or a deficiency in the payment of estimated tax, the record of such deed is not invalidated by reason of such omission, inaccuracy, erroneous certification or deficiency and the title founded on such
deed is not impaired thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
163.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
